sourcesContent:
Confirm delete operation

Are you sure you want to delete this Order?

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgbActiveModal } from '@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap'; import { IOrder } from '../order.model'; import { OrderService } from '../service/order.service'; @Component({ templateUrl: './order-delete-dialog.component.html', }) export class OrderDeleteDialogComponent { order?: IOrder; constructor(protected orderService: OrderService, protected activeModal: NgbActiveModal) {} cancel(): void { this.activeModal.dismiss(); } confirmDelete(id: number): void { this.orderService.delete(id).subscribe(() => { this.activeModal.close('deleted'); }); } }
